A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’m a life long fan of the original trilogy and have waited 30 plus years to see more of Luke and find out what happened in Luke’s life in the interim. The Last Jedi is THE greatest disappointments in my life\, as far as books\, comics and movies are concerned. I’m done with Star Wars. Rian Johnson did you get a thrill spitting in the fans faces?
